data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: White Rock, California, USA (WRK001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at White Rock, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2009-04-22. The instrument depth was 004 meters, in an overall water depth of 24 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
